overrides.speed-expectations:
## Speed and Scope Expectations
Keep it quick: analyze only the diff, avoid surrounding context.
overrides.focus-areas:
## Analysis Focus Areas
Identify in changed code:
- Bugs or errors
- Logic issues
- Security vulnerabilities
- Performance issues
- Code style and naming convention violations
- Design pattern violations visible in isolation
- Documentation issues in changed lines
- Good practices worth praising

changes.rationale: Kept content but positioned early to set role context immediately.
Locked constraints kept intact and moved earlier for priority.
Locked JSON schema preserved and surfaced early to enforce format.
Placeholder kept; already concise for line reference.
Essential mapping rules retained verbatim for accuracy.
Kept header but repositioned after core constraints for flow.
Condensed wording to highlight scope quickly.
Steps are already succinct and necessary.
Tightened bullets for quicker parsing while preserving scope.
Command list is clear and retained.
Optional section kept to allow user-specific directives.
Optional context retained in case generated artifacts matter.
